text: Deon Jones (born January 4, 1993) is an American professional basketball player who last played for Fukushima Firebonds in Japan. As a senior at Monmouth, Jones averaged 10.4 points and 6.3 rebounds per game. ==References== ==External links== *Monmouth Hawks bio Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:American expatriate basketball people in Japan Category:Earth Friends Tokyo Z players Category:Fukushima Firebonds players Category:Monmouth Hawks men's basketball players Category:Towson Tigers men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Chester, Pennsylvania Category:Basketball players from Pennsylvania Category:American men's basketball players Category:Shooting guards
title: Deon Jones
